backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the AI Job Portal backend, defining types and CRUD operations for user profiles, job listings, applications, and interviews, with role-based access control, user approval, file storage, and Stripe integration mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three implemented features (Home page improvements, Admin Panel system reports, and dark mode coverage) to their relevant files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose or stub status of every component, page, and hook in the Job Portal frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all page routes, renders the shared navigation/footer/chatbot layout, and shows a role-selection modal for newly authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AIRecommendation: Component that fetches AI-generated job recommendations filtered by user skills and a selected category, then renders scored job cards with a match badge.
frontend/src/components/CareerChatbot.ts: A floating chatbot UI component that provides career guidance by matching user input against a knowledge base and displaying bot/user messages in a chat panel with suggested questions.
A stub component kept to prevent import errors; it renders nothing as the EarningsSummary type no longer exists in the backend.
frontend/src/components/EmployerAnalytic: Displays per-job application statistics (total, shortlisted, hired, rejected) for an employer using bar charts powered by Recharts, fetching application data via a custom query hook.
frontend/src/components/FarmingChatbot.t: A floating FAQ-based chatbot for farming advice that matches user messages against a keyword-driven knowledge base covering topics like soil, irrigation, pests, and crop seasons.
frontend/src/components/InterviewSchedul: A form component that allows employers to schedule interviews by selecting a job, entering an applicant's Principal ID, date, time, and notes, and displays previously scheduled interviews.
frontend/src/components/JobApplicationCa: Renders a card showing a job application's title, employer, applied date, and status badge, with a button to download a PDF summary of the application.
frontend/src/components/JobApplicationMo: A dialog modal that shows job details and lets an authenticated user submit a job application, displaying a success state after submission.
frontend/src/components/JobBrowser.tsx: Renders a searchable, filterable job listing browser with search, location, and job type filters, fetching active jobs via a query hook and displaying them as JobCard components.
frontend/src/components/JobCard.tsx: Displays a single job listing card with title, location, salary, deadline, skills, and action buttons for viewing details, saving, or applying to a job.
frontend/src/components/JobPostForm.tsx: Form component for creating or editing a job listing, supporting fields for title, description, location, salary, job type, and required skills, with create/update mutation support.
frontend/src/components/JobSeekerProfile: Form for job seekers to edit their profile including name, preferred location, skills, education, and experience, persisting extended data to localStorage and saving core profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: A small button component that toggles the application language between English and Tamil using the useLanguage hook.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing loading state during authentication and clearing the query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, nav links, theme/language toggles, and an authenticated user dropdown menu with dashboard routing based on user role.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Stub component that renders nothing, kept to prevent import errors after the Product type was removed from the backend.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Stub component that renders nothing, kept to prevent import errors after the Product type was removed from the backend.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to home and users with incorrect roles to an access-denied page, showing a skeleton loader while auth state initializes.
frontend/src/components/ResumeScoreDispl: Displays a resume score (out of 100) calculated from skills, education, experience, and resume file upload, with a progress bar and per-factor breakdown.
frontend/src/components/ReviewForm.tsx: Stub component that renders nothing; kept to prevent import errors after the review/useAddReview backend functionality was removed.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionMod: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name and select a role (job seeker, employer, or admin), then saves the profile via useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/SalaryPrediction: Displays an AI-predicted salary range for a given job category and years of experience, fetched via usePredictSalary.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigurat: Stub component that renders nothing; kept to prevent import errors after Stripe hooks were removed.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes using the useTheme hook, showing a Sun or Moon icon accordingly.
Renders a grid of saved job listings using JobCard components, or an empty state if no jobs are saved.
frontend/src/data/chatbotKnowledgeBase.t: Defines a FAQ knowledge base with keyword-matched entries covering resume writing, interview prep, career planning, skill development, and job search strategies for use by a chatbot.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Stub hook returning empty cart state and no-op functions; kept to prevent import errors after cart functionality was removed for the Job Portal.
frontend/src/hooks/useGenerateApplicatio: Provides a generatePDF function that builds and opens an HTML-based printable application summary document with applicant details, job info, status, and skills.
frontend/src/hooks/useGenerateInvoicePDF: Stub hook returning a no-op generateInvoicePDF function; kept to prevent import errors after invoice PDF functionality was removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguage.ts: Implements a shared language state hook supporting English and Tamil, with localStorage persistence and a translation lookup function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend actor calls including user profiles, job listings, applications, and interviews with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and applies the theme class to the document root.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains English and Tamil translation strings for all UI labels and messages used throughout the application.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH colors, Tailwind base styles, and application-specific utility classes like status badge styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with a hero image, mission statement, and step-by-step guides for job seekers and employers using i18n translations.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Displays an access denied page with a shield icon and navigation buttons that redirect users to the home page or their role-appropriate dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel with tabs for managing user approvals, job listings, and system analytics; supports approving/rejecting users and removing jobs.
frontend/src/pages/CartCheckout.tsx: Stub page that immediately redirects to the home route, replacing a removed cart/checkout feature.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboard.tsx: Stub page that immediately redirects to the home route, replacing a removed customer dashboard feature.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerDashboard.tsx: Protected employer dashboard with tabs for managing job postings, viewing applicants, scheduling interviews, and analytics; includes an approval request banner.
frontend/src/pages/FarmerDashboard.tsx: Stub page that immediately redirects to the home route, replacing a removed farmer dashboard feature.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page displaying a hero section, job category grid, and platform stats with navigation to job listings and role-based registration.
frontend/src/pages/JobDetails.tsx: Displays full details for a single job listing including skills, deadline, and salary prediction, with options to apply or save the job.
frontend/src/pages/JobListings.tsx: Browsable job listings page with search, location, job type, and salary filters, plus inline apply and save functionality.
frontend/src/pages/JobSeekerDashboard.ts: Job seeker dashboard page with tabs for profile, job browsing, applications, wishlist, and AI recommendations. Wraps content in a ProtectedRoute requiring the 'job_seeker' role and manages saved jobs and seeker profile via localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Simple payment failure page displaying an error card with a red XCircle icon and a button to navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Simple payment success page displaying a confirmation card with a green CheckCircle icon and buttons to navigate to the seeker dashboard or home page.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListing.tsx: Stub page that immediately redirects to '/jobs' since the product listing concept has been replaced by the job portal.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with helpers for persisting values in sessionStorage and cleaning sensitive params from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palettes (portal, teal, amber), typography (Inter/DM Sans), border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the job portal UI.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file describing the full-stack AI-based job portal architecture, existing implemented features, known issues, and versioning information.
